content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":46080,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a67093cc-459b-4cf2-9f55-d0a34aabd1e8/80572250-welcome-word-and-sign-on-colorful-paper-notes-vector-eps-10-illustration-on-white-background-.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a67093cc-459b-4cf2-9f55-d0a34aabd1e8/80572250-welcome-word-and-sign-on-colorful-paper-notes-vector-eps-10-illustration-on-white-background-.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"80572250-welcome-word-and-sign-on-colorful-paper-notes-vector-eps-10-illustration-on-white-background-.jpg\",\"name\":\"80572250-welcome-word-and-sign-on-colorful-paper-notes-vector-eps-10-illustration-on-white-background-.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a67093cc-459b-4cf2-9f55-d0a34aabd1e8\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":450,\"height\":164},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome to the Mobile Testing course!  Here you will expand your knowledge regarding mobile devices, some tools used on mobile testing and some helpful tips.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The course has the following modules:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.\\tHistory of mobile devices\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\tMobile Devices and their uses\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.\\tMobile Apps Types\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.\\tTypes of Testing on Mobile Apps\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.\\tDifferences between Desktop and Mobile Testing\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.\\tDevices Setup for Testing\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7.\\tSimulators, Emulators and Cloud solutions\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"8.\\tStreaming and sticks\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9.\\tAPI and Logs\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
